thread.title: CDP and South Pole launch water scoring system for companies
thread.title_full: CDP and South Pole launch water scoring system for companies

title: CDP and South Pole launch water scoring system for companies
text:
End date CDP and South Pole launch water scoring system for companies 
A system for assessing and comparing companies' water management practices is being launched by CDP – the non-profit formerly known as the Carbon Disclosure Project – and South Pole, an advisory company and project developer based in Switzerland. To access this article please sign-in below or register for a free one-month trial. Login
